issue.title: Inertia calculation for fixed joints incorrect

content.raw:
Most of the affected links have minor errors in MOI, with the exception of `l_hand` and `r_hand` links, with differences in values listed below:

`r_hand` before the patch:
~~~
    <link name='r_hand'>
      <pose>0.011500 -0.848000 0.465000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
      <inertial>
        <pose>-0.002948 -0.097394 0.021568 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
        <mass>4.626000</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.046860</ixx>
          <ixy>-0.001242</ixy>
          <ixz>0.001940</ixz>
          <iyy>0.016274</iyy>
          <iyz>0.010136</iyz>
          <izz>0.037867</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
~~~

`r_hand` after the patch:
~~~
    <link name='r_hand'>
      <pose>0.011500 -0.848000 0.465000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
      <inertial>
        <pose>0.021445 -0.093647 0.000895 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
        <mass>4.626000</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.018261</ixx>
          <ixy>0.000218</ixy>
          <ixz>0.001270</ixz>
          <iyy>0.013959</iyy>
          <iyz>-0.000005</iyz>
          <izz>0.015384</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
~~~

`l_hand` before patch:
~~~
    <link name='l_hand'>
      <pose>0.011500 0.848000 0.465000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
      <inertial>
        <pose>-0.002948 0.097394 0.021568 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
        <mass>4.626000</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.046860</ixx>
          <ixy>0.001242</ixy>
          <ixz>0.001940</ixz>
          <iyy>0.016274</iyy>
          <iyz>-0.010136</iyz>
          <izz>0.037867</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
~~~

`l_hand` after patch:
~~~
    <link name='l_hand'>
      <pose>0.011500 0.848000 0.465000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
      <inertial>
        <pose>0.021445 0.093647 0.000895 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000</pose>
        <mass>4.626000</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.018261</ixx>
          <ixy>-0.000218</ixy>
          <ixz>0.001270</ixz>
          <iyy>0.013959</iyy>
          <iyz>0.000005</iyz>
          <izz>0.015384</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
~~~

Also attached is the inertia values before and after the patch is applied.
